CustomField.description: Used for Document creation to reference the full name from all the inputs from a questionnaire and to have it auto update depending on choices made from Suffix etc.
CustomField.formula: litify_pm__First_Name__c + " " + Middle_Name__c + " " + litify_pm__Last_Name__c + IF( ISPICKVAL( Suffix__c, 'N/A'), "", " " + TEXT(Suffix__c ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Full name that will show up on Signature Documents for the Client
CustomField.label: Client Full Name
